CustomField.description: Defines the Country Code for this Geo data layer, being either a literal value (e.g. USA) or the name of a field in the GeoJson file's feature properties (e.g. {ISO_A3})
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the Country Code for this Geo data layer, being either a literal value (e.g. USA) or the name of a field in the GeoJson file's feature properties (e.g. {ISO_A3})
CustomField.label: CountryCode
